Articles.Content:
hey guys i got kerbpaint but i cant paint the structural panels, how do you do that?

Also. nice ship Spartwo, the colour reminds me of the old english galleons from the 1700s.

New version, page 26.

Still needs.

-RCS

-Test run

-Launcher

3 variants outfitted.

A-I

4 AFMs+2 torps

C-I

6 Rippers+2 modified torps already onboard(high impact)

EDIT:I plan to continue with C, it's not as similar but looks better.

Edited April 29, 2014 by Spartwo
Hey, Spartwo how do you paint the structural panels on your ships?

New version, page 26.

*sigh* 10 char
Sorry, i missed that. Cheers.

I was thinking of asking for a ship donation so I can have ideas on how they are constructed but then I was like "Lol, no. If I actually make a decent combat ship without any external help it just makes it all the more satisfying." How do you guys set up the battles at the certain body? Do you edit persistent files so that there are suddenly ships in orbit or do you manually launch them? The answer has been evading me for a while.

I was thinking of asking for a ship donation so I can have ideas on how they are constructed but then I was like "Lol, no. If I actually make a decent combat ship without any external help it just makes it all the more satisfying." How do you guys set up the battles at the certain body? Do you edit persistent files so that there are suddenly ships in orbit or do you manually launch them? The answer has been evading me for a while.

We use they hyper edit mod. One person hyper edit's there ships into position, then he/she uploads it. the other person downloads it and boom, battle begins

I kinda want to enter although I don't have the time and it's started D: This looks really cool

I'm not sure what you mean by "it's started". Anyone can jump in at any time.

I'm hoping of joining in but before I can make a combat ship I need to know, If you decouple a missile, select it, and then fire it without guiding it, is it considered a dumb fire missile? I'm wondering this because if it is counted as guided I can only shoot from up to 2.5km.

I'm hoping of joining in but before I can make a combat ship I need to know, If you decouple a missile, select it, and then fire it without guiding it, is it considered a dumb fire missile? I'm wondering this because if it is counted as guided I can only shoot from up to 2.5km.

I think guided missiles are allowed now as long as you're within 250m when you release it.

I think guided missiles are allowed now as long as you're within 250m when you release it.

*2500 frfrecfer

Anyone knows where ScriptKitt3h is? I can wait if he has to do IRL stuffs but my ships have been orbiting EVE for 9 days. IIRC he had his move ready to post

I'll wait a bit more and if he doesn't post anything I'll battle someone else

Anyone knows where ScriptKitt3h is? I can wait if he has to do IRL stuffs but my ships have been orbiting EVE for 9 days. IIRC he had his move ready to post

I'll wait a bit more and if he doesn't post anything I'll battle someone else

Seeing as he to is from southern USA like me, odds are he is studying for finals or getting close to taking them

I'm working on a new ship with my new install to become my temporary flagship for the fleet.

I'll post a picture with some details in a while and i'd love to here what you guys have to say.

I'm working on a new ship with my new install to become my temporary flagship for the fleet.

I'll post a picture with some details in a while and i'd love to here what you guys have to say.

EDIT: I ran into a setback on the supercarrier(main .craft corrupted, so I had to revert to this state) And I thought I could always build smaller, so I did...

On top there is a crew compartment with room for 24. on the bottom is an enclave for a opportunity class LGT. an the sides are 6 Mombassa class drop pods.

EDITRDIT:

Edited May 1, 2014 by Spartwo

No time for ksp right now. I do have a quick question though.

Should I go for this yamakasi http://www.amazon.com/Perfect-Yamakasi-2560x1600-Computer-Monitor/dp/8918010656/ref=pd_cp_pc_1 or this crossover http://www.amazon.com/Crossover-30Q5-Pro-Black-Resolution/dp/B00BJFMH4W/ref=sr_1_1?s=electronics&ie=UTF8&qid=1398912386&sr=1-1&keywords=30+inch+monitor+ips

I could always shoot for the big fish: http://www.amazon.com/Samsung-28-Inch-Definition-Monitor-U28D590D/dp/B00IEZGWI2

I just have a tearing dilemma between ips and 4k. My gtx 760 can certainly support 4k.
I'm posting a whopping 33 image gallery of my adventures in weapons testing! It's uploading nao.
